name: Chocolate Fondue
description: Chocolate Fondue, bred by DNA Genetics, is a sativa-dominant cross that balances the uplifting effects of Chocolope with the relaxing effects and unique flavors of Exodus Cheese. The effects of Chocolate Fondue relax the body and calm the mind into a blissful state of consciousness. Its complex bouquet and sweet flavors make this cannabis strain enjoyable day or night.
attributes_title: Relaxed, Uplifted, Happy, Talkative, Euphoric, Depression, Stress, Nausea, Fatigue, Lack of Appetite, Dry Mouth, Dry Eyes, Dizzy, Headache, Anxious
